executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
CRITICAL FOCUS: Test Gantt Chart Pro dependencies features thoroughly:
1. TC003: Zoom 50%-300% and verify dependency arrows stay connected and aligned at ALL zoom levels
2. TC006: Drag/drop tasks and verify dependency arrows update correctly, resize tasks and verify arrows adjust
3. TC010: Open task detail modal and verify it shows BOTH predecessors (depends_on) AND successors (blocks) with full details

For EVERY task tested, verify:
- Tooltip shows dependencies when hovering (⬅️ Depends on, ➡️ Blocks)
- Modal shows full dependency details with task names and statuses
- Dependencies are CONSISTENT across tooltip and modal
- No "chỗ có chỗ không" - either ALL tasks show dependencies or NONE (must be consistent)

Test specifically these tasks that SHOULD have dependencies:
- "2. Basic Setup (All VPS)" - should have dependencies
- "0.2.3 Create DNS Records" - check if has dependencies
- "4.1 Deploy Grafana" - should have dependencies

Report ANY inconsistencies where some tasks show dependencies and others don't!
